content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.

name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your time and effort in showing me this apartment. name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I'm glad to hear that you're looking for a fair and ethical agreement. name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
